column1: #Text=Gommu says : " Uh , say , think I can I get one of them tasty - smelling fishies ? "
#Text=Korra says : " So , do you ... live in that bush ? "
#Text=Gommu says : " Yes , presently that is what I do call home .
#Text=I thought everyone in this city was " living it up " .
#Text=" Gommu says : " Hey , you 've got a lot to learn , newcomer .
#Text=" Protester says : " Are you tired of living under the tyranny of benders ?
#Text=For too long , the bending elite of this city have forced nonbenders to live as lower class citizens .
#Text=Join Amon , and together we will tear down the bending establishment .
#Text=" Korra says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=Bending is the coolest thing in the world .
#Text=" Protester says : " Then I bet you 'd just love to knock me off this platform with some waterbending , huh ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm seriously thinking about it .
#Text=" Protester says : " This is what 's wrong with this city !
#Text=Benders like this girl only use their power to oppress us !
#Text=" Protester says : " That did n't even make sense .
